description.narrative: This activity (States Accountability and Voice Initiative (SAVI)) is a component of States Accountability and Voice Initiative (SAVI) reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £32,321,657. This component benefits Nigeria, and works in the following sector(s): Public finance management (PFM), Decentralisation and support to subnational government, Anti-corruption organisations and institutions, Democratic participation and civil society, Media and free flow of information, Human rights, Women's equality organisations and institutions. , with the following implementing partners: Palladium International Ltd (UK). The start date is 01-08-2008 and the end date is 30-04-2016.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
